page.title: 10CLUBS
page.content: There has been an increase in the number of clubs based in the village catering for both young and old.For the children there are both scout and guide groups including Brownies and Cubs.The Brownies meet in the School on Thursday at 5.45 while the other groups meet in the Scout Hut on Tuesdays and Fridays at 7.00 for Cubs Scouts and Thursdays at 6.45 for the Guides.A Shooting Club has recently been formed at the Royal Oak which shoots on the second Sunday of every month at a field on the Suckley Road.A handsome new Wenden Trophy has just been won for the first time.On Saturday nights there is a Country and Western Club which meets at the Somers Arms and a group of local craftsmen have regular exhibitions at the same venue.
